body:
Dear all,

I am looking for a way to assign measurement grids on the surfaces of Radiance geometries?automatically.??RSHOW written by? Peter Apian-Bennewitz is the closest I can find.? Could anybody give some other suggestions? Thanks a lot.

Cheers,
Kam
